lines.text: Amazing - - when I open the window I smell mothballs -...
John, do you see what I see?
Perfectly, sir. You're watching yourself in the mirror, but you look under the weather from last night.
I hope you don't see this as a sign of seven years bad luck, Sir! You'd better be careful getting about today, Sir.
I'll go by horseback. Call for my horse.
You've turned mother's house into a dance hall. I'm returning your ring!

[Posing as the Railroad Station Master, to the black woman traveler to New Orleans]
And it's free, honey child!
You're very nice, but you're becoming a little too familiar.
